parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of instance N on which you want to stop the process of the Cloud Assistant command. You can specify up to 50 instance IDs in each request. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: InvokeId
parameters.description: The ID of the command task. You can call the [DescribeInvocations](~~64840~~) operation to query all task IDs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the command task. You can call the [DescribeInvocations](~~64840~~) operation to query the IDs of all command tasks.
